com.ericsson.oss.itpf.datalayer.dps.database

Interface DatabaseFreeSpaceInfoChecker


  • public interface DatabaseFreeSpaceInfoChecker
    Provides methods to convert the available free space into DatabaseStorageSpaceInfo.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.ericsson.oss.itpf.datalayer.dps.database.DatabaseStorageSpaceInfo getStorageSpaceInfo(long currentFreeSpace)
      Get the storage space info based on the available space in the database storage.
      long getThresholdValueWhichCausesStatusChange(com.ericsson.oss.itpf.datalayer.dps.database.DatabaseStorageSpaceStatus oldStatus, com.ericsson.oss.itpf.datalayer.dps.database.DatabaseStorageSpaceStatus newStatus)
      Determine what caused a particular status change.
      void setThresholds(long freeSpaceWarningThreshold, long freeSpaceCriticalThreshold)
      Change the configured thresholds for this checker.

    • Method Detail

      • getStorageSpaceInfo

        com.ericsson.oss.itpf.datalayer.dps.database.DatabaseStorageSpaceInfo getStorageSpaceInfo(long currentFreeSpace)
        Get the storage space info based on the available space in the database storage.
        Parameters:
        currentFreeSpace - the measured free space, in bytes.
        Returns:
        the storage space info, based on configured thresholds.

      • setThresholds

        void setThresholds(long freeSpaceWarningThreshold,
                   long freeSpaceCriticalThreshold)
        Change the configured thresholds for this checker.

        This method is synchronized to ensure this change will not affect any ongoing determination of storage space info.

        Parameters:
        freeSpaceWarningThreshold - the threshold below which the database should be deemed to be in a warning state.
        freeSpaceCriticalThreshold - the threshold below which the database should be deemed to be in a critical state.

      • getThresholdValueWhichCausesStatusChange

        long getThresholdValueWhichCausesStatusChange(com.ericsson.oss.itpf.datalayer.dps.database.DatabaseStorageSpaceStatus oldStatus,
                                              com.ericsson.oss.itpf.datalayer.dps.database.DatabaseStorageSpaceStatus newStatus)
        Determine what caused a particular status change.
        Parameters:
        oldStatus - the old status.
        newStatus - the new status.
        Returns:
        the configured threshold which caused the change.
